settings: {"anno_y_enabled":true,"anno_y_lines":"全港整體接種率:: 19.7","chart_type":"column_grouped","column_padding_inner":10,"facet_header_color":null,"height_mode":"aspect","labels":true,"layout.footer_note":"統計處以15-19歲統計人口，故16-19歲接種與實際有出入，只作參考","layout.footer_note_secondary":"註：截至5月25日，以接種最少一劑疫苗的人數佔該年齡組別人口百分比計算","layout.header_logo_enabled":true,"layout.header_logo_height":4.5,"layout.header_logo_src":"https://i.imgur.com/IGfOlUB.png","layout.source_label":"數據來源：","layout.source_name":"政府新聞處、統計處（2020年臨時人口數字）","layout.subtitle":"60歲或以上人士最先接種疫苗，其後逐步擴大年齡組別，16至29歲人士4月23日起開始接種","layout.title":"40至49歲人士疫苗接種比率最高；60歲或以上、29歲或以下接種率低於全港平均接種率","layout.title_size":"2","layout.title_styling":false,"legend_mode":"off","margin_bottom":"0","margin_top":"0","number_format.n_dec":1,"number_format_secondary.suffix":"","number_format.suffix":"%","y2.linear_max":30,"y2.linear_min":0,"y.gridlines_visible":false,"y.linear_max":null}
